item.title: Korean Language Classes Now Open
item.description:
Korean Language Classes Now Enrolling Students!

Registration Open: Join Our Next Korean Language Cohort

K-CareerNet is now accepting applications for our comprehensive Korean language programs. Whether you’re a complete beginner or looking to advance your existing Korean skills for professional purposes, our classes are designed to help you achieve fluency and career success.

Programs Now Accepting Students

Business Korean Program

Next Session Starts: October 15, 2025 Duration: 12 weeks (36 sessions) Class Size: Limited to 6 students maximum Schedule Options:

  • Evening Classes: Monday, Wednesday, Friday 7:00-9:00 PM
  • Weekend Intensive: Saturday 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM

What You’ll Learn:

  • Professional workplace communication
  • Industry-specific vocabulary
  • Business email and presentation skills
  • Korean corporate etiquette
  • Meeting participation and negotiation

TOPIK Certification Preparation

Next Session Starts: November 1, 2025 Duration: 8 weeks intensive Target Levels: TOPIK 3-6 preparation Success Rate: 95% first-attempt pass rate

Course Features:

  • Comprehensive test strategies
  • Weekly mock examinations
  • Personalized feedback sessions
  • Writing and listening skill development
  • Official test registration support

Regular Korean Courses

Beginner Level (1-2): Starting October 8, 2025 Intermediate Level (3-4): Starting October 22, 2025 Advanced Level (5-6): Starting November 5, 2025

Flexible Scheduling:

  • Weekday evening options
  • Weekend morning sessions
  • Private tutoring available

Who Should Apply

Career Professionals: Seeking advancement in Korean companies or Korean-Indonesian business relations Job Seekers: Planning to work in Korea or with Korean corporations Students: Preparing for further education or internships in Korea Business Owners: Expanding operations to Korean markets Anyone: Interested in Korean culture and professional development

What Makes Our Classes Different

Small Class Sizes: Maximum 6 students per group ensures personalized attention Native Instructors: Qualified Korean teachers with corporate training experience Practical Focus: Every lesson connects to real workplace scenarios Cultural Integration: Learn language alongside essential Korean business culture Job Placement Support: Career guidance and networking opportunities included

Enrollment Requirements

No Previous Korean Required: Beginner-friendly programs available Commitment Level: Regular attendance and participation expected Materials Included: All textbooks and learning resources provided Assessment: Placement test to determine appropriate starting level

Current Availability

Business Korean Program: 4 spots remaining TOPIK Preparation: 6 spots available Beginner Classes: 8 spots open Intermediate Classes: 3 spots remaining Advanced Classes: 5 spots available

Investment in Your Future

Our programs offer exceptional value with comprehensive support:

  • All course materials included
  • Access to online learning platform
  • Cultural workshop sessions
  • Certificate of completion
  • Job placement assistance
  • Alumni networking events

Payment Options: Flexible plans available with early registration discounts

How to Enroll

Step 1: Contact Us

Reach out to schedule your free Korean level assessment and program consultation.

Step 2: Placement Assessment

Take our quick evaluation to determine your current Korean proficiency level.

Step 3: Program Selection

Choose the program that best fits your goals and schedule preferences.

Step 4: Registration Confirmation

Secure your spot with enrollment completion and materials pickup.

Limited Time Benefits

Early Bird Discount: 15% off tuition for registrations completed by September 20, 2025 Free Assessment: Complimentary Korean proficiency evaluation Bonus Materials: Additional study resources for first 20 students

Student Success Stories

Our previous students have achieved remarkable career advancement, with many securing positions at major Korean companies including Samsung, LG, Hyundai, and SK Group within months of program completion.

Reserve Your Spot Today

Class sizes are intentionally small, and spots fill quickly. Don’t miss this opportunity to advance your Korean language skills and career prospects.

Contact Information

ðŸ“± WhatsApp: +82-10-1234-5678
ðŸ“ž Phone: +82-2-1234-5678
ðŸ’¬ KakaoTalk: @k-careernet

Note: Classes begin promptly on scheduled dates. Early registration recommended to secure preferred time slots.

item.title: Korean Language Summer Camp
item.description:
Korean Language Summer Camp Applications Now Open!

Registration Open: Join Our Intensive Summer Program

K-CareerNet is now accepting applications for our Korean Language Summer Camp - a comprehensive 4-week immersive experience designed to accelerate your Korean proficiency while providing deep cultural understanding and professional networking opportunities.

Program Details

2025 Summer Camp Session

Program Dates: July 7 - August 1, 2025 (4 weeks) Application Deadline: April 30, 2025 Participant Limit: 16 students maximum Location: Seoul, South Korea with accommodation in Gangnam area

Who Can Apply

Minimum Requirements:

  • Basic Korean knowledge (beginner level acceptable)
  • Age 18 and above
  • Valid passport with minimum 6 months validity
  • Health insurance coverage
  • Commitment to full program participation

Ideal Participants:

  • Professionals preparing for Korean work opportunities
  • University students interested in Korean culture and business
  • Career changers seeking Korean market entry
  • Business owners expanding to Korean markets

What’s Included

Comprehensive Learning Experience

Daily Korean Classes: 4 hours of intensive language instruction Cultural Workshops: Traditional cooking, crafts, and etiquette training Company Visits: Tours of major Korean corporations including Samsung and LG Professional Networking: Meet Korean business leaders and fellow international professionals

Full Support Package

Accommodation: Modern dormitory-style housing in prime Seoul location All Meals: Authentic Korean cuisine breakfast, lunch, and dinner Transportation: Subway passes and organized transport for all activities Materials: Textbooks, workbooks, and digital learning resources

Cultural Immersion Activities

  • Seoul city orientation and historical site tours
  • Traditional Korean cooking classes
  • K-pop and Korean drama analysis sessions
  • Shopping and market exploration
  • Weekend excursions to cultural landmarks

Weekly Program Structure

Week 1: Foundation and Orientation

  • Korean language placement and intensive basics
  • Seoul city tour and cultural orientation
  • Korean business etiquette introduction
  • Welcome dinner and participant networking

Week 2: Communication Development

  • Business Korean conversation practice
  • Korean company visit and networking
  • Traditional cultural workshop participation
  • Korean cooking class and market visit

Week 3: Professional Application

  • Mock job interviews in Korean
  • TOPIK preparation and practice testing
  • Cultural exchange events with Korean professionals
  • Visit to major Korean corporate headquarters

Week 4: Integration and Graduation

  • Final presentations and skill assessments
  • Career consultation and planning sessions
  • Graduation ceremony and certification
  • Alumni network introduction

Application Process

Step 1: Initial Application

Submit completed application form with basic information and motivation statement.

Step 2: Document Submission

Provide required documents including passport copy, health insurance proof, and Korean proficiency evidence.

Step 3: Interview Process

Participate in brief video interview to assess commitment and program fit.

Step 4: Acceptance and Preparation

Receive acceptance notification and pre-program preparation materials.

Investment Information

Program Fee: Contact for current pricing and payment plan options Early Application Discount: 20% reduction for applications submitted by February 28, 2025 Payment Plans: Flexible installment options available Cancellation Policy: Full refund available until May 15, 2025

Fee Includes

  • All accommodation and meals
  • Daily transportation passes
  • Learning materials and resources
  • Cultural activity participation
  • Company visit arrangements
  • Certificate of completion
  • Alumni network access

Success Outcomes

Previous camp participants have reported significant achievements:

  • Average Korean proficiency improvement of 2 TOPIK levels
  • 85% of participants secured Korean job opportunities within 6 months
  • Lifelong professional networks established
  • Enhanced cultural competency for Korean business environments

Application Requirements

Required Documents:

  • Completed application form
  • Passport copy (valid 6+ months)
  • Health insurance documentation
  • Korean proficiency evidence (if applicable)
  • Motivation letter (500 words maximum)
  • Emergency contact information

Health and Safety:

  • Health insurance coverage mandatory
  • Basic health screening required
  • COVID-19 vaccination recommended
  • Emergency medical support available

Limited Availability

With only 16 spots available, early application is strongly recommended. Our previous camps have filled within weeks of opening registration.

Current Status:

  • Applications accepted: Starting immediately
  • Spots remaining: 16 available
  • Priority given to: Complete applications with early submission

Apply Today

Don’t miss this opportunity for intensive Korean language learning combined with authentic cultural immersion.

Contact Information

item.title: Korean Visa Applications
item.description:
We’re Now Open for Korean Visa Applications!

Announcement: Visa Services Now Available

K-CareerNet is excited to announce that we are now accepting applications for our Korean work visa support services. Our certified immigration specialists are ready to assist Indonesian professionals with their Korean visa applications.

What We’re Accepting Now

E-7 Work Visa Applications

  • Professional and technical workers
  • Skilled positions in Korean companies
  • Specialized knowledge and experience roles
  • Management and executive positions

Visa Status Changes

  • Student visa to work visa transitions
  • Visitor visa to work visa changes
  • Dependent visa status modifications
  • Visa category upgrades and extensions

New Application Intake

We are currently accepting new clients for:

  • Initial visa consultations
  • Document preparation services
  • Application submission support
  • Legal consultation and guidance

Why Apply Now

Streamlined Process: Our systems are fully operational with dedicated case managers Current Requirements: Up-to-date knowledge of latest immigration policies Fast Track Options: Expedited processing available for urgent cases Comprehensive Support: End-to-end assistance from consultation to approval

Application Requirements

To begin your visa application process, you’ll need:

Basic Requirements

  • Valid Indonesian passport (minimum 6 months validity)
  • Korean job offer or sponsorship letter
  • Educational qualification documents
  • Professional experience verification

Supporting Documents

  • Criminal background check from Indonesia
  • Health examination results
  • Financial statements
  • Previous employment records

Our Service Commitment

Free Initial Consultation: 30-minute assessment of your visa eligibility Transparent Pricing: No hidden fees with clear cost breakdown Regular Updates: Weekly progress reports on your application status Success-Focused: Dedicated to maximizing your approval chances

Current Processing Times

Standard Applications: 6-8 weeks from submission Priority Processing: 4-5 weeks (additional fees apply) Complex Cases: 8-12 weeks depending on circumstances

How to Get Started

Step 1: Schedule Consultation

Book your free initial consultation to assess your eligibility and discuss your specific situation.

Step 2: Document Review

We’ll provide a personalized checklist of required documents for your case.

Step 3: Application Preparation

Our team will prepare and review all application materials before submission.

Step 4: Submission and Tracking

We handle the submission process and provide regular status updates.

Limited Time Offer

Early Registration Benefit: First 50 applicants receive complimentary document translation services (up to 5 documents)

Corporate Packages: Special rates available for companies sponsoring multiple employees

Contact Information

ðŸ“§ Email: info@k-careernet.com
ðŸ“± WhatsApp: +82-10-1234-5678
ðŸ“ž Phone: +82-2-1234-5678
ðŸ’¬ KakaoTalk: @k-careernet

Note: Visa approval depends on meeting Korean Immigration Service requirements. We provide professional support but cannot guarantee approval outcomes.
